sentences.english: They were moved to tears by his honesty.
sentences.chinese: 他们为他的诚实感动得落下了眼泪。

sentences.english: Americans see it as a sign of genuineness and honesty.
sentences.chinese: 而美国人却认为这是真诚和诚实的表示。

sentences.english: But those who plan what is good find love and faithfulness.
sentences.chinese: 谋善的，必得慈爱和诚实。

sentences.english: An honest, hard-working man is the salt of the earth.
sentences.chinese: 诚实而勤劳的人是社会的中坚分子。

sentences.english: What a precious gift honesty is in the midst of so much dishonesty.
sentences.chinese: 在如此多的欺骗中，诚实时如此的难能可贵。

sentences.english: Apparent authority is an application of thegeneral principle of good faith in Civil Law.
sentences.chinese: 表见代理是诚实信用这一民法基本原则的适用。

sentences.english: The only shield to his memory is the rectitude and sincerity of his actions.
sentences.chinese: 在追忆往事时，唯一的盾牌是他的行为正直和诚实。

sentences.english: He is just a dishonest trickster.
sentences.chinese: 床破只是一个不诚实的骗子。

sentences.english: As a small businessperson you have no greater leverage than the truth.
sentences.chinese: 作为一个小商人，诚实是最大的优势。

sentences.english: She gave ingenuous answers to all of the strangers' questions.
sentences.chinese: 她诚实地回答了所有陌生人提出的问题。

sentences.english: They were the dupes of a clever but dishonest salesman.
sentences.chinese: 他们被一个聪明但不诚实的推销员骗了。

sentences.english: The dishonest manager defrauded the company of millions of pounds.
sentences.chinese: 这个不诚实的经理诈取了公司几百万英镑。

sentences.english: Truthfulness is at the foundation of all personal excellence.
sentences.chinese: 诚实是一切个人优秀品质的根基。

sentences.english: Maybe Indonesia is just too honest.
sentences.chinese: 也许只是印尼太诚实了。

sentences.english: We can certify for his honesty.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以保证他的诚实。

definition: (idiom) one's actions are in keeping with what one says
to speak and keep one's promise (idiom); as good as one's word
